name: Godfrey Cape, Black
description: The Godfrey larp cape has a unique design that offers more mobility of the arms during larp battles. This ankle length cape makes a great accessory and is great with any medieval or fantasy clothing. Allow your character to feel the protection of this amazing larp cape.

description: The Godfrey larp cape has a unique design that offers more mobility of the arms during larp battles. This ankle length cape makes a great accessory and is great with any medieval or fantasy clothing. Allow your character to feel the protection of this amazing larp cape.

name: Aramis Cape, Red
description: The Dark Red Aramis hip length cape adds a touch of glamour to your larp costume. This cotton cape can be worn over one or both shoulders by tying the long satin cord. The fine appearance of this cape makes it necessary for any musketeer, noble or high priest.

name: Aramis Cape, Black
description: The Black Aramis Cape is a short hip length cape that resembles a musketeer cape. Meant to be worn over one or both shoulders, it adds flair due to its rich detailing and embellished by its gold and black trim. Its fine appearance will fit well with a variety or renaissance costumes.

name: Aramis Cape, Green
description: This rich Green Azure Aramis Cape is a hip length caplet designed for any musketeer, noble or nobleman.  You can easily wear this cape over one or both shoulders securing it firmly in place using the long satin cord. The rich gold and black trim and open arm slits further embellish this awesome cape.

name: Regulus Cape, Green
description: Our green cotton Regulus cape has a noble feel to it and is enhanced by large pleated shoulders. This cape that provides adequate cover and some protection from the elements thanks to its rounded shoulders and lengthy sides. This one size fit all cape is not only cool but was designed with an elevated backside helping to prevent your feet from entangling...

name: Regulus Cape, Black
description: Our beautifully crafted Black Regulus cape has full length sides and a pleated collar in addition to an elevated backside helping to prevent your feet from entangling in the cape. This cape can either be attached to your armor or together at the neck using the tie string. Made from soft cotton this elegant cape will make you stand separate from the...

name: Edrahil Cape, Dryad Green and Brown
description: Every good ranger needs a cape that will allow him a full range of movement when running through the woods. This dryad green Edrahil cape rests perfectly on your shoulders and allows you to easily draw your larp weapon when faced with danger. The cut back features lengthier edges in addition to an elevated backside helping to prevent your feet from...

name: Regulus Cape, Dark Red
description: The dark red Regulus cape is an imperial style cape intended to make a class to your larp character. Itâ€™s bellowing pleated shoulders add dimension to your costume and can be affixed to your armor or your neck using the drawstrings. The cut has longer edges and a higher back side preventing your feet from entangling in the cape when charging into battle.

name: Edrahil Cape, Black
description: The Black Edrahil cape is a free-flowing knee length cotton cape designed more as a fashion accessory perfectly draping your shoulders. The open form gives you free reign and a wide range of movement for those epic larp battles. The cut has longer sides and a raised back prevents your feet from entangling in the cape.

name: Edrahil Cape, Azure Green and Black
description: The Azure Green Edrahil cape has its own unique style and was designed to give a dramatic effect to your larp character. The cape was intendd to grant quick easy access to your weapons with an unhindered movement because of its fantasy cut. This cotton cape is perfect for the woodsman or soldier that drapes the shoulders well and conforms to the shape of...

name: Regulus Cape, Blue
description: Our blue natural cotton Regulus larp cape has a semi regal, virtuous appearance to it enriched by its large bellowing pleated shoulders. This cape provides sufficient cover from the outside weather because of its lengthy sides.

name: RFB Arthur Cape, Dark Green
description: The Arthur larp cape has a fitted hood and is angle length with a classical cut. This basic medieval cape adds layering to your character while providing basic coverage from the elements. Designed with larping in mind the Arthur cape is made to offer comfort and concealment for your character.

name: Exclusive Cape, Green
description: This embroidered exclusive green cape is action length with hood and is comfortable to wear and has a contrasting color liner that is somewhat shorter creating a layered effect.  This elvish cape is a wonderful addition to any costume and the exclusive cotton cape keeps you warm during those cool nights or to give a dramatic entrance as a high elf.

name: Wool Cape, Grey
description: This fine quality full length medieval grey wool cape comes with a hood and is ideal for cold nights around the campfire or in the deep woods. A cape will enhance your costume creating a dramatic effect while keeping you warm and cozy.
